title: Can't move my character after minion spawn.
body:
This started yesterday actually, (right when I got back from a sleepover so I don't know how long it's been doing this), but every time I would go into a game, everything would appear fine until I'm in lane and the minions spawn. My ping slowly gets worse and worse until I literally can't move my character any more, minions were moving and the other players were free to kill me but I was just standing there.

I've tried playing other games but they seem to be working fine, I even have a program with this feature that allows me to keep track of my ping all the time and it seems to be 27-30, even though in League it was at 1000.

I use Optus by the way.

EDIT: Fixed. The program I used to track my ping was called csfospeed uses traffic shaping. I read somewhere that traffic shaping is a big red flag so I uninstalled it, and my ping was fine !

replies.body:
Hey Jencarna,

This does sound pretty strange indeed.  1000 ping is very high.  What kind of internet connection do you have (eg. adsl/cable)?

Have you looked over the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article?

Also, I'd be interested to know which program you use that allows you to track ping?

Cheers
Mindstar

I actually fixed it myself awhile ago !

The program I used was called csfospeed, and I read somewhere that traffic shaping can harm your ping and download speeds.
Then I learned this program uses traffic shaping.

Wasn't a problem before, but after I uninstalled it my ping was fine.
